q: ahead.`` Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false,'' Jameel Jaffer , ACLU's deputy legal director, said in a written statement. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic.... This effort to rewrite history is shameful. Donald Rumsfeld 's office is not commenting on the book until its Tuesday release date. But according to early reports, he devotes much of the autobiography to defending his tenure in the President Bush administration and his handling

Asked about former Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell 's infamous 2003 speech to the United Nations in which he cited questionable intelligence about Iraq's alleged weapons program, Donald Rumsfeld said Colin Powell was an`` honorable man'' who believed every word he gave in that speech. Donald Rumsfeld also defended the detention camp at Guantanamo Bay, which the Obama administration has been unsuccessfully trying to shutter for the past two years. starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week.`` We need to completely rethink the minivan,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products that can still carry a lot of people but won't look like traditional minivans. President Bush Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself.
